Introduction

Fanxy Red is a Chinese girl group with a tomboy concept under TOV Entertainment. The group consists of three female members who dress and act like tomboys.

The group debuted in 2017 as Acrush, a five-member C-pop group formed by Zhejiang Huati Culture Communication Co. Ltd. in collaboration with Fantasy Football Confederation.

They released their first single “Action” on April 28, 2017. Later that year, two new members, Feng Yuxuan and Peng Yiyang (Joel) joined the group. Their second single “I’m Sorry” was released in November 2017 but did not include Min Junqian who departed the group in December.

In February 2018, Feng Yuxuan left and the group re-branded as Fanxy Red. In April 2019, Joel also left the group. They re-debuted in both China and South Korea with their single album “Activate” on August 28, 2019.
